name: Crush Grip
effect:
If the foe has a Base HP greater than 3, add 1 Die to the Damage pool for every exceeding point. Up to 3 Dice may be added this way. 
 At Silver Rank, the move's effect can add up to 6 dice.
 At Gold Rank, this move inflicts wounds.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 3. 
 At Diamond Rank, instead add dice equal to the foe's base HP, up to 8.
description: The Pokemon grips the foe and starts crushing it. Small targets are difficult to grasp but larger bodies will not be released until they break.
